name: Halo 2
description:
I will just take this bit from the Project Cartographer webpage
BY DOWNLOADING THE FILES
YOU AGREE TO OWNING
HALO 2 FOR WINDOWS VISTA

task.description: Installing Halo 2 just click through with the default settings.
task.name: wineexec

content:
files:
- H2install: http://www.h2maps.net/Cartographer/Installer/h2pc_installer_1.8.1.zip
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: /drive_c/Games/Halo 2 Project Cartographer/halo2.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE/H2/
    file: H2install
- task:
    arch: win32
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: wmp9
    description: Installing wmp9
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    description: Installing Halo 2 just click through with the default settings.
    executable: $CACHE/H2/h2pc_setup_1.8.1.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
system:
  disable_compositor: 'true'
wine:
  d9vk: true
  esync: true
  version: lutris-4.16-x86_64
